name: Bers (ENG)
description:
Bers = reliability. This fact is known to everyone, even frogs, but we decided to remind you about this once again. Bers will help you solve any of your problems, and well-mannered employees will be happy to help you figure it out in bureaucratic nuances.

The game was developed in 48 hours on the Ludum Dare 47 gamejam,
Jam theme: Stuck in a loop

Feedback from our clients
  • “My psy was rocked). The rest is beautiful! " Alexey
  • "Your GD damn genius)" Victoria
  • "Cool game, thug as life itself" Anna
Made in 48 hours by team TUC:

uma waratte — gamedesigner, writer, 2D artist, teamlead (itch, discord: Utti#7463)

All matches with real organizations are random! But it is not exactly!
